articles.author: Madushka Balasuriya
articles.title: Sri Lanka on the verge of a selection committee shake-up - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Sri Lankan government's National Sports Selection Committee is set to meet on January 30 to take a final call
articles.content: NewsSri Lankan government's National Sports Selection Committee is set to meet on January 30 to take a final call
